title: Demex Webapp Config
description: demex-webapp-config is a repository to allow frontends to fetch metadata associated with Demex

prelaunch_markets.description: List of market names designated as Pre-Launch markets

transfer_options.description: List of blockchain networks and their priority numbers, used to set their order in deposit and withdrawal forms transfer option dropdown

network_fees.description: List of token denoms and their priority numbers, used to set their order in network fee preferences

maintenance.description: Dictates whether or not the maintenance page is displayed on each particular network.

title.description: Title shown on maintenance page (optional). If not provided, the title of the page will default to "Service Maintenance"

message.description: Description shown on maintenance page (optional). If not provided, the description of the page will default to "Website is temporily unavailable due to planned maintenance. We will be back soon."

cross_selling_source_tokens.description: List of cross selling source token denoms

typeform_widget_config.description: Ongoing survey configs for typeform survey widget

external_chain_channels.description: Map of destination channels for external IBC chains

additional_ibc_token_config.description: List of information for tokens that (1) are not added on Carbon blockchain or (2) require packet forwarding

promoMarkets.description: List of market names designated as promo markets during the Demex Trading League competition

currentPrizeSymbol.description: The symbol of the prize token, mainly used to display the prize symbol and token icon on the Demex Trading League page.

currentCompPerpPoolId.description: Id of the perp pool that provides liquidity for the promo markets of the Demex Trading League event.

show_from.description: The date and time when the perp pool banner is scheduled to begin displaying (optional). If not provided, the banner will be shown immediately.

show_until.description: The date and time when the perp pool banner is scheduled to stop displaying (optional). If not provided, the banner will continue to display indefinitely.

title.description: The title shown on the banner

removed_markets.description: The message shown on the banner describing markets being removed

past_tense_text.description: The alternative message shown after the date of markets being added or removed has passed

added_markets.description: The message shown on the banner describing markets being added

subtext.description: The subtext shown on the banner

start.description: The start time of perp pool promo

end.description: The end time of perp pool promo

perpPoolDepositBoost.description: The spin boost multiplier for deposits in perp pool

perpTradingBoost.description: The spin boost multiplier for boosted perp markets trading volume

survey_end.description: The end time of the tyepform survey

additional_ibc_token_info.description: Information for token that (1) is not added on Carbon blockchain or (2) requires packet forwarding.

baseDenom.description: Denom of token on its native chain

chainRoutes.description: List of IBC chains that token needs to be forwarded through before being deposited into Carbon

denomOnCarbon.description: Denom of token on Carbon chain (omit if token is not added to Carbon chain)

distributors.description: List of ERC-20 distributor contracts for Perp Pool Incentives

proxy.description: ERC-20 contract claim and unwrap from incentives distributor for wrapped SWTH
